meanings.definition: The quality or state of being detachable.
meanings.sent1: The detachabilities of the toy made it easy to take apart and put back together.
meanings.sent2: The detachabilities of the magnets allowed them to be easily separated and reattached.
meanings.sent3: The detachabilities of the puzzle pieces led to a fun challenge of putting them back together.
meanings.sent4: Her detachabilities were like a puzzle waiting to be solved by those who dared to try.
meanings.sent5: The detachabilities of the Velcro made it a convenient fastening option.

meanings.definition: The ability to be separated or disconnected.
meanings.sent1: The detachabilities of the phone case made it easy to remove for cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The detachabilities of the power cord allowed for easy replacement if needed.
meanings.sent3: The detachabilities of the headphones caused a funny mix-up when they got switched around.
meanings.sent4: His detachabilities from the group made him feel like a lone wolf in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The detachabilities of the Velcro strap made it simple to adjust for a perfect fit.
